List of Employees

ID First name Last Name Email Department Contact number Actions
{{item.id}} {{item.name}} {{item.surname}} {{item.email}} {{item.department}} {{item.contactNo}}
import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { ServiceService } from 'src/app/services/service.service'; @Component({ selector: 'app-home', templateUrl: './home.component.html', styleUrls: ['./home.component.css'] }) export class HomeComponent { constructor(private service:ServiceService) {} items:any; ngOnInit() { this.service.getEmployeeAll() .subscribe(data => { this.items = data; }); } delete(empId:any){ this.service.deleteEmployee(empId).subscribe( data => { console.log(data); this.service.getEmployeeAll(); }) } }
